[Unable to display image]
  The egg opened. Out came the Completed Beast mode of Galvatron. (as seen in 
picture.) The cloak of Death hung from his back. His red dragon mode now a 
pure silver color. he had guns on both knees and gold should armor. His tail 
could open up to show death's sythe. And out of his arm He could retrieve 
Apocalypse's flame sword. The three where no one. He  spread his wings and 
flew off. he tried to see what his robot mode loked like. He couldnt 
transform. He was stuck. The drill mode, the robot mode, and the dragon mode 
where too complex to transform into manualy. He would havbe to find another 
way. He scanned the region for another.
